name: Valdrada
description:
Valdrada is an Action-Adventure game taking place in the city of Valdrada. The ultimate goal of the game is to reach the hidden treasure somewhere in the city on the way to your goal, you will have to discover the city and its beauty, and mesmerizing scenery of the lake, and the mirrors that are spread out across the entire city. The mirrors will deceive you at some points but will also help you with your adventure, some interactive elements in the game will guide you towards the right path. Along your journey, you will have to fight off some monsters that are trying to kill anyone who searches for the treasure.

Game by Faisal Hamdan, made for DATT 3300 Lab 02.
